mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Dr. Sidney Isenberg Collection on Carson McCullers Papers, 1948-1971
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McCullers, Carson, 1917-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: McCullers mentions plans to meet at the Statler hotel in Washington. It's implied that the occasion is the psychiatric convention to be held in Washington. She discusses a stay on a farm in Connecticut with friends and seeing the friend's doctor.

There are several files available. There is one JPG image for each page of the original document. One PDF was created from scans of the original document and includes all pages. One PDF is a transcription of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Health
Mental illness
Friendship
Washington (D.C.)
Creation (Literary, artistic, etc.)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Carson McCullers to Dr. Sidney Isenberg, May 12, 1948 (correspondence)
